text: yeah someone asked a question about

should i go in business with this person
if you cannot decide

take the path

and what your brain is doing through
conflict avoidance is it's trying to
push off the short-term pain
and by definition if the two are even
and one has short-term pain that means
it has long-term gain and by the law of
compound interest the long-term gain is
where you want to go towards anyway so
your brain is over
valuing the side that has the short
short-term happiness and it's trying to
avoid the one with short-term pain so
you have to cancel that tendency out and
it's a powerful subconscious tendency by
leaning into the pain
as most of you know
most of the gains in life come from
